title: Convenient keyless entry, Expansive decks & views**
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 767 Sq.
Welcome to The Carter on the Park, stylish modern apartment living in Downtown, Redmond, WA.
From the natural beauty to the luxury amenities there's plenty to show-and-tell at our community in Downtown Redmond.

LEED Gold water-efficient faucets and showerheads, Sliding barn doors, Wash & dryer, Protected Heron Rookery and Sammamish River views*, Air conditioning hook-up*, Under-mount sinks, Custom built-ins*, Over-the-range-hood, Built-in open shelving, Desk niches, Quartz bathroom countertops, Live/Work, Urban One, One, Two Bedroom homes plus Lofts, Convenient keyless entry, Stainless steel, Whirlpool appliances, Unique tech areas and wood-paneling*, Built-in under counter microwave, Hardwood laminate, polished concrete with carpet, Expansive decks & views**, French-door refrigerators, Quietest dishwasher in class, Built-in shelves and hooks in kitchen, Wall pot rack hanging system, Lush carpet in bedrooms, Fiber Internet wired, Spacious pantry, Retractable kitchen faucets, Quartz countertops, Generous walk-through closets, 14-foot ceilings**, Subway tile backsplash

Fetch delivery service, Peaceful rooftop escape that looks over a protected Heron rookery and the Sammamish River, Co-working space, Bike work station, Tech Bar, Outdoor ping-pong table, Grilling station, Community firepit, State of the art fitness facility, Demonstration kitchen, Two-story bike storage facility, On-site museum lobby showcasing world-renowned art of many local and international artists, Deluxe TopBrewer coffee self-serve bar, Interior courtyard
